name: Papi Commando: Second Blood
overview: This is the 2nd game of Papi Commando called Papi Commando: Second Blood Papi (Grandpa) is back and angrier than ever! Help him find his beloved Commostrad, alone or in co-op mode with his wife, Mami (Grandma) Commando. Fight the terrible C++ forces through more than 100 missions across 10 stages until the final battle against the infamous Colonel KassTaGoul (also known as Colonel BreakYaFace)! Twitter https://twitter.com/studiovetea
